claim: Flublok is produced using a novel production platform in which recombinant HA is expressed in insect cells using a baculovirus expression vector system (BEVS).
explanation: Header section of an Elsevier journal article showing the Vaccine journal title, ScienceDirect link, Elsevier logo, and journal homepage URL. The image only shows the journal cover/header information and contains no details about Flublok production, recombinant HA expression, insect cells, or BEVS, and therefore does not support the claim.
